title: Today's F1 starting grid for the 2025 US Grand Prix
summary: Max Verstappen dominated again as he clinched pole position for the 2025 US Grand Prix, while championship leader Oscar Piastri was just sixth fastest. Here's the starting grid for Sunday's race at Circuit of the Americas

qa_pairs.question: Who secured pole position for the 2025 US Grand Prix?
What position did championship leader Oscar Piastri qualify for the 2025 US Grand Prix?
Which circuit hosted the 2025 US Grand Prix?
